trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur hungers for your help.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Garharlor.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Garharlor.

TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, glad to─ <rumble>
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>Nnngh... Forgive my clamoring belly. Working in the cold, it seems I can scarcely digest a meal before I'm dreaming of the next.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>Still, I know those doing the heavy lifting and shoveling must be even more ravenous.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>The bitter cold has taken its toll on our stomachs, particularly those of us doing the lifting and shoveling.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_006<tab>To replenish our dwindling food stores, a new cornfield is to be tilled at the foot of the mountain, but we've been asked to furnish the supplies ourselves.

TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_007<tab>It is this task with which I would request your assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Speak to Garharlor here, who shall provide you with everything you need.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I hear you'll be assisting us with preparations for the cornfield.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_011<tab>I'd like you to build large, sturdy containers to hold compost. Should you run out of materials, I will gladly provide more.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_012<tab>I'd like you to craft some tools used in plowing the fields. Should you run out of materials, I will gladly provide more.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_013<tab>I'd like you to concoct growth formula for use on the crops. Should you run out of ingredients, I will gladly provide more.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_014<tab>Oh, and once you've finished, hand it all straight to Vuyargur─he will know what to do with it.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_015<tab>Have you run out of materials? ...Seems not. Carry on, then, and submit whatever you finish to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_GARHARLOR_000_018<tab>Have you run out of materials? Use these, then.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_025<tab>Any progress on those field supplies?
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_026<tab>Oh, these will be perfect! I'll make sure they're sent to the site straightaway.
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_027<tab>And here's your reward for a job well─ <rumble>
TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_028<tab>...Ahem. I think it's time I went and found something to eat.

TEXT_BANYOK122_05357_VUYARGUR_000_029<tab>And while our meals as of late have been pleasantly filling, we may need more supplies sooner rather than later. All this hard labor really works up an appetite!
